***** Nepali[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [t̪ʌt̪ʰjäŋkʌ]
    * Phonetic Devanagari: तथ्याङ्क
**** Noun[edit] ****
तथ्याङ्क • (tathyāṅka)
   1. statistics
**** References[edit] ****
    * “तथ्याङ्क”, inनेपाली बृहत् शब्दकोश (Nepālī Br̥hat Śabdakoś)[Comprehensive
      Nepali Dictionary], Kathmandu: Nepal_Academy, 2018
    * Schmidt, Ruth L. (1993), “तथ्याङ्क”, inA Practical Dictionary of Modern
      Nepali, Ratna Sagar
***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [tətʰjaŋkə]
**** Noun[edit] ****
तथ्याङ्क • (tathyāṅka) ? (Newa Spelling 𑐟𑐠𑑂𑐫𑐵𑐒𑑂𑐎)
   1. statistics
